sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const AddPerson = (props) => { const [schulungsleitIDs, setSchulungsleitIDs] = React.useState([]); const [managerIDs, setManagerIDs] = React.useState([]); React.useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:3001/db?getSchulungsleitIDs=true`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { setSchulungsleitIDs(data); }).then(() => fetch(`http://localhost:3001/db?getManagerIDs=true`)) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { setManagerIDs(data); }); }, []); function renderSwitch(param) { switch(param) { case 'manager': return ( <>
Gehalt:

Beschreibung:

); case 'lehrer': return ( <>
Skype-login:

Arbeitswochen:

Schulungsleit.-ID:

Manager-ID:

); case 'schueler': return ( <>
Niveau:

Gruppen-ID:

Zahlungs-ID:

Manager-ID:

); default: return; } } return (
Add person:
Role:

Manager
Lehrer
Schüler
Name:

Surname:

E-mail:

Phone:

{renderSwitch(props.person.role)}
)}; export default AddPerson;
